name: Heart on Your Sleeve (mousebirdstudios, morimem022, nine, dreadhime, wei, SmallBunny)
name_original: Heart on Your Sleeve (mousebirdstudios, morimem022, nine, dreadhime, wei, SmallBunny)
description:
Tonight isn't meant to be a special occasion. You aren't expecting to make some kind of memory of a lifetime on your second date with Taylor — you're just getting ready to leave for casual dinner outing between two people who are pretty fond of each other. That's all there is to it.

Why, then, is it so hard to pick an outfit for the night? Why do none of the options feel like the right one?

Heart on Your Sleeve is a feel-good visual novel about how self-image can affect interactions with others. It offers a number of choices for a split-route experience, each revealing something more about the relationship between the protagonist and Taylor, as well as exploring concerns about comfort, appearance and the insecurities that accompany them.

Made for SuNoFes 2021.

Features
  • 13k+ words (~30 min to an hour of play time)
  • 5 outfit routes, 2.5 endings based on choices, 5 cgs
  • 4 songs in the soundtrack (2 unique songs, 2 remixes)
